titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation concerning the well-making of soape.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: "The new society of Soapmakers is to oversee all manufacture and importation, etc."--STC.
Dated at end: Giuen at the court at Greenwich, the eight and twentieth day of Iune, in the eighth yeere of the reigne of our Soueraigne Lord, Charles ...
Arms 21 (with C R at the top); natiue people 2) should 3) doeth the.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
